entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 27.
